attributes.action: Hand over his power to Russel Brand so he can start his revulution.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If you listen to the Russel Brand Show on Radio 2 on Saturday's at 10pm he goes on about his revulution and he wants to start it, so i have started a petition to start it.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
